posts.post_content:
$275.00 delivered. Check or money order only. No electronic payments. Sales tax applies if delivery is in New York. Please use email: [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] for all communication as my PM inbox tends to get full. As always, "I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations, requests for additional pictures, etc. Offering 10% (included in above price) off all cards on my updated website this month. Thank you for your consideration.

[IMG]http://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/t206doy54.jpg[/IMG]

Ed,

If this is the same one you showed me at the last National it is really a nice one. A PSA 1 I would not of guessed. I am hoping this is a different one.

posts.post_title: Re: PSA1 Piedmont 42 Doyle for sale
posts.post_content: It is a different one, Adam.The one at the National didn't last the day. You might take a wild guess at who bought it.
